tool_description: A simple but power mail sending api with ease
title: email-sending (medeluxe)

api_list.name: Send Mail
api_list.description: Effortlessly send emails with our powerful ***/send-mail*** API route. Streamlined integration, reliable delivery, seamless communication.

api_list.name: Rules
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://email-sending-medeluxe.p.rapidapi.com/rules"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-sending-medeluxe.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Send Mail
api_list.description: Effortlessly send emails with our powerful ***/send-mail*** API route. Streamlined integration, reliable delivery, seamless communication.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://email-sending-medeluxe.p.rapidapi.com/send-mail"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-sending-medeluxe.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://email-sending-medeluxe.p.rapidapi.com/send-mail"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "email-sending-medeluxe.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
